subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Rays’ bullpen will have to make up for the 420 appearances made by their closer, Rafael Soriano, and six other relievers who left as free agents after last season.
snippet: The Rays’ bullpen will have to make up for the 420 appearances made by their closer, Rafael Soriano, and six other relievers who left as free agents after last season.
